products.name: 3 Hand Sanitizers Mystic Foliage
products.description: Cleanse and moisturize your hands with this formula with Aloe Vera that eliminates 99.99% of bacteria. This Mystic Foliage collection will leave your hands delicately scented and remind you of the warmness of the tropics and the exotic flora.

products.name: Hand Sanitizer Tales of Lotus
products.description: Cleanse and moisturize your hands with this formula with Aloe Vera that eliminates 99.99% of bacteria. The Tales of Lotus fragrance will leave your skin a delicate scent of delicate water petals with white figs and dry fruit notes.

products.name: Hand Sanitizer Forest Grace
products.description: Cleanse and moisturize your hands with this formula with Aloe Vera that eliminates 99.99% of bacteria. The Forest Grace fragrance will leave your skin a delicate fresh and fruity scent that will remind you of a tropical rainforest.

products.name: Hand Sanitizer Refill Forest Grace
products.description: Cleanse and moisturize your hands with this formula with Aloe Vera that eliminates 99.99% of bacteria. The Forest Grace fragrance will leave your skin a delicate fresh and fruity scent that will remind you of a tropical rainforest.

products.name: Hand Sanitizer Wild Orchid
products.description: Cleanse and moisturize your hands with this formula with Aloe Vera that eliminates 99.99% of bacteria. The Wild Orchid fragrance will leave your skin a delicate scent of wild orchids, vanilla and Indian Sandalwood.

products.name: Hydrating Hand Sanitizer - 3 Pack
products.description: In ancient times, medicinal flowers and herbs were commonly used to achieve great advantages for the body and the mind. This is why we have packed them together to bring you only the best of the best. Our tested formula is full of natural ingredients to leave your hands soft and healthy while killing 99.99% of virus and bacteria.

products.name: Case & Lanyard Bright Rose
products.description: Safe vibes wherever you go with our light pink Case + Lanyard. This must-have gadget is not only the perfect accessory to any outfit but is also convenient for the modern busy life. Hanging out with friends? Going into a work meeting? Two toddlers tugging on your pants? Wear your HAAN Pocket as a necklace or attach it your backpack to have it always at hand. * (Hand Sanitizer Not Included)

products.name: Hand Sanitizer Soothing Lavender
products.description: No need to travel to Aix-en-Provence to smell Lavender’s fresh aromatic scent. Its natural formula is packed with Aloe Vera extract to take care of your hands, keeping them hydrated, refreshed and clean.

products.name: Hand Sanitizer Refill LA
products.description: Now your favorite lavender fragrance also kills 99,99% of bacteria and viruses while leaving your hands feeling soft and hydrated. Buy your HAAN Pocket once and refill it for life with this Smoothing Lavender pouch. Join the refillable revolution!

products.name: Hydrating Hand Sanitizer & Refill Pack
products.description: Our Soothing Lavender combo has come into our lives to stay (for a long time). Create a beautifully flower scented, healthy hand ritual by spraying this HAAN Pocket on your hands. The best part? You get a Refill pouch to recharge your hand sanitizer up to 3 times.

products.name: Hydrating Hand Sanitizer & Lanyard Pack
products.description: Clean your hands anytime and anywhere, wearing your favorite Smoothing Lavender HAAN Pocket with a cool and convenient accessory. 2 in 1 has never looked this stylish! * (Hand Sanitizer Included)

products.name: Case & Lanyard Soothing Lavender
products.description: This light purple Lanyard + Case will become your new best friend. A piece that literally goes with everything. Whether heading out to work or playing ball with friends, this accessory will become a staple in your wardrobe. Wear it hung as a necklace or attached to your bag to keep your hands clean and virus-free at all times! * (Hand Sanitizer Not Included)

products.name: Hand Sanitizer Purifying Verbena
products.description: This paraben-free formula with Aloe Vera avoids drying your hands and moisturizes them instead. An all-natural fragrance that features a relaxing blend of citrus, florals and wood scent.

products.name: Hand Sanitizer Refill VE
products.description: Do you want to get over 1200 sprays of your Purifying Verbena hand sanitizer? Get this Refill pouch now and enjoy clean and moisturized hands for a lifetime. Best part? By getting this Refill you reduce 89% of the amount of plastic used to create a HAAN Pocket.

products.name: Hydrating Hand Sanitizer & Refill Pack
products.description: You don’t have to worry about your light green hand sanitizer finishing because with this pack you can recharge it for a lifetime. Get rid of 99,99% of harmful virus and bacteria with your HAAN Pocket Purifying Verbena. Cares for your hands and for the planet as well.

products.name: Lanyard Pack
products.description: Clean your hands anytime and anywhere, wearing your favorite Purifying Verbena HAAN Pocket with a cool and convenient accessory. 2 in 1 has never looked this stylish! * (Hand Sanitizer Included)

products.name: Case & Lanyard Purifying Verbena
products.description: Clean your hands anytime and anywhere, with this cool and convenient accessory. Inspired by our Purifying Verbena fragrance, this Case + Lanyard brings a pop of green freshness to your daily outfits while providing the safety and functionality needed in a modern busy lifestyle. Hands-free has never looked this good! * (Hand Sanitizer Not Included)

products.name: Hand Sanitizer Healing Chrysants
products.description: Treat yourself to our relaxing Healing Chrysants scent. An easy-to-carry everyday essential, packed with natural ingredients to cleanse, hydrate and refresh your hands. Let flowers take care of you!

products.name: Hand Sanitizer Refill CH
products.description: A rare floral note is recreated by green basil and cardamom in this aromatic user-friendly Refill. Now your favorite HAAN Pocket lasts up to 3 times longer thanks to its Refill pouch.

products.name: Hydrating Hand Sanitizer & Refill Pack
products.description: A forever relaxed skin with this refillable Chrysant inspired hand sanitizer. Every day can be an autumn afternoon in a magical garden with just a couple of sprays. And remember, every spray contributes to building clean water wells in developing countries.

products.name: Hydrating Hand Sanitizer & Lanyard Pack
products.description: Clean your hands anytime and anywhere, wearing your favorite Healing Chrysants HAAN Pocket with a cool and convenient accessory. 2 in 1 has never looked this stylish! * (Hand Sanitizer Included)

products.name: Case & Lanyard Healing Chrysants
products.description: Who needs hours of hunting for the perfect accessory when you have Healing Chrysants Nude Case + Lanyard to go with everything? No matter whether you feel like dressing up or keeping it casual, this feminine Lanyard + Case will give you that chic factor, while you keep your hands clean and virus-free with your HAAN Pocket. * (Hand Sanitizer Not Included)
